title: Code Geass: Fukkatsu no Lelouch
original_name: コードギアス 復活のルルーシュ
sinopse:
The long-awaited "Resurrection" arc of the "definitive" version of the Code Geass manga has started!

Lelouch and Suzaku have finally accomplished Zero Requiem. What awaits them beyond the peace that the boys risked their lives to build...!? The story begins with a completely original story that depicts the blank period until the resurrection!

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
